## 2. RUN (not render) all .qmd in sequence

```{r}
files_to_run <- c(
  "01_load.qmd",
  "02_cleaning.qmd",
  "03_PCA_DESeq2.qmd",
  "04_DEXSeq.qmd",
  "05_compare_DESeq2_DEXSeq.qmd",
  "06_FGSEA.qmd",
  "07_integration_fisher.qmd"
)
```

## 3. Run each file without producing HTML

```{r}
for (f in files_to_run) {
message("\n=== RUNNING: ", f, " ===")
quarto::quarto_run(f)
}

message("\nAll scripts executed successfully!")
```
